backend/main.mo: Actor storing submissions and user profiles with AccessControl checks, supporting anonymous IDs and admin-only retrieval or summaries.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text list summarizing major frontend files, components, hooks, and their purposes in the Rose Day app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining color tokens, theme variables, and light/dark mode CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app managing lock→questions→reveal flow, admin mode, petals overlay, and music toggle.
frontend/src/components/MusicToggle.tsx: React music control button that loads, auto-starts, and toggles looping background audio.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/RoseBlo: Animated rose-bloom overlay with petals, heartbeat audio, and timed message reveal.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/RoseDay: Admin UI displaying submissions with loading, errors, scroll area, and close control.
A lock screen component showing an animated heart and a button that triggers an unlock callback.
A multi-step question wizard that validates answers, tracks progress, and submits them through a custom hook.
A reveal page displaying romantic text and a button that opens a full-screen rose bloom animation dialog.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/RosePet: Generates floating rose petal emoji elements with random positions and animation timings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoseDaySubmissions: Fetches and normalizes Rose Day submissions from the backend actor for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitRoseDayAnswe: Handles answer submission with actor readiness checks, error handling, and development-mode bypassing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode styles, utilities, and keyframe animations for rose-themed UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a Gallery page component.
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a Photos page component.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a Videos page component.
frontend/src/utils/roseDayAnswerValidati: Provides date-answer validation for Rose Day prompts, supporting flexible day–month input formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, color tokens, typography, animations, and content paths with custom rose/pink palettes.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, deployment-related requirements, and feature request tracking information.
